title: Bug 124599: Shortcut delete and menu delete behave differently in table column.
description:
Description: Shortcut delete and menu delete behave differently in table column.
Steps to reproduce: 1. [Additional Steps Needed]
EB:
Undo it, click delete in context menu.
Expected result: Shortcut delete and menu delete should behave consistently.
Actual result: In step 2, the entire grid in the group header was deleted. In step 3, the grid in the group header remained untouched.
SR: Open the attached file in bug 124598. In the file, the second table has a list/grid nested in its group header and a merge in the group header row. 2. Select the second column, press delete on your keyboard. 3. [Additional Steps Needed]
